mapper.select: select mano as attachNo ,uploadpath ,filename ,filetype ,manualno as refNo ,eno ,regdate from manualattach where manualno = #{refNo}
select mano as attachNo ,uploadpath ,filename ,filetype ,manualno as refNo ,eno ,regdate from manualattach where mano=#{attachNo}

SELECT 'MA' || trim(nvl(max(to_char(to_number(substr(mano,3))+1,'000000')),'000001')) as attachNo from manualattach
union
select nvl(null,'MA000001') as attachNo from dual where not exists (select mano from manualattach)
